de.polygonal.ds.GraphArc

type
class
A graph arc represents an uni-directional link between two graph nodes.

Constructor

new(node : GraphNode<T>, cost : Float)
Creates a graph arc pointing to node with a weight of cost .

Instance Variables

cost : Float

The weight (or cost) of the arc.

next : GraphArc<T>

The GraphNode class manages a doubly linked list of graph arcs; this is a reference to the next graph arc in the list.

node : GraphNode<T>

The node that the arc points to.

prev : GraphArc<T>

The GraphNode class manages a doubly linked list of graph arcs; this is a reference to the previous graph arc in the list.

Instance Methods

val() : T

Returns the value of the node that this arc points to.
